ans.reasoning: The method containsNone(CharSequence cs, String invalidChars) is responsible for checking if a given CharSequence contains any characters from a specified string of invalid characters. This suggests a potential issue in how the method handles supplementary characters, which is directly related to the test case.

The method containsNone(CharSequence cs, char[] searchChars) checks if the CharSequence contains any characters from a character array. While this method is also related to the functionality being tested, it is less suspicious than method 0 because it is not directly invoked in the failing test case.
